function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Continuous monitoring of indoor thermal performance throughout the year may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases within the building.","Impact":"Higher risk of airborne or respiratory contagious diseases spreading among occupants if the indoor monitoring is not managed properly.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and ventilation measures to reduce the spread of airborne contaminants. Ensure regular cleaning and disinfection of monitoring equipment.","Technologies":"Use air purifiers, UV disinfection, and HVAC systems with high-efficiency filters to improve indoor air quality and reduce the spread of contagious diseases.","People":"Occupants, maintenance staff, and visitors in the office building.","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance team, and health and safety personnel."}]}
